subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|さき|yomi=k}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=さき}}. Cognate with {{m|ja|崎|tr=saki||a (geographical) point, where the land sticks out into the water}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|さき}}

# before, previous
# [[end]], [[tip]]
# [[earlier]], the [[past]]
# [[afterwards]], the [[future]]
# the [[destination]] of a motion or action
# [[sequel]]
# [[ahead]], in [[front]]

subSections.title: Compounds

subSections.text: * {{ja-r|先達て|せんだって}}, {{ja-r|先だって|せんだって}}
